text: Kåre Marius Opdal (5 September 1931 - 8 May 2017)Kåre Opdal's obituary was a Norwegian alpine skier, born in Narvik. He competed in the downhill at the Winter Olympics in Cortina d'Ampezzo in 1956. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Alpine skiers at the 1956 Winter Olympics Category:Norwegian male alpine skiers Category:Olympic alpine skiers of Norway Category:People from Narvik
title: Kåre Opdal
